issue.title: Confusing typo in specification for get_time

discussion.p: Extended Manipulators p8 defines the semantics of get_time in terms of a function f.
Note the call to tm.get. This is clearly an error, as tm is a type and not an object. I believe this should be tg.get, rather than tm, but this is not my area of expertise.
discussion.note: 2010-01-14 Moved to Tentatively Ready after 5 positive votes on c++std-lib.
